title: At least 1,000 schools in 35 states have closed for in-person learning since the start of the school year: COVID-19 updates
content:
1. At least 1,000 schools in 35 states have closed for in-person learning since the start of the school year: COVID-19 updates  USA TODAY
  2. A new COVID-19 variant called Mu that might be able to evade immunity from vaccines has been detected in almost every US state  Yahoo News
  3. Mu COVID variant detected in LA County  FOX 11 Los Angeles
  4. What is coronavirus mu variant? Officials watching new variant of interest in U.S.  SILive.com
  5. New COVID-19 variant in US | Coronavirus | 9 News Australia  9 News Australia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 35州の少なくとも1,000の学校が、学校年度開始以来、対面式学習のために閉鎖されています。COVID-19の最新情報
自开学以来，35个州的至少1000所学校已经关闭，供人学习。COVID-19更新
自開學以來，35個州的至少1000所學校已經關閉，供人學習。COVID-19更新
